cmp: 匕 (an ancient type of spoon, dagger/ladle)
mng: opinion, view, theory, doctrine, to discuss, to talk about, to regard, to consider, per, by the (kilometer, hour etc)

exm.mng: to comment on, to discuss, comment, commentary
no matter what or how, regardless of whether...
expression of opinion, views, remarks, arguments
theory, to argue, to take notice of
paper, treatise, thesis, to discuss a paper or thesis (old)
